title: 468. Nap Time for Everyone!
description: The benefits of sleep are by now well established, and yet many people don’t get enough. A new study suggests we should channel our inner toddler and get 30 minutes of shut-eye in the afternoon. But are we ready for a napping revolution?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
